actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain land of the United States shall be held by the United States in trust for certain communities of the Mdewakanton Sioux in Minnesota.

summary.text: Declares that specified land of the United States shall be held in trust for specified communities of the Mdewakanton Sioux in Minnesota. Includes the land held in trust for each community under this Act in the reservation lands of such community.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain land of the United States shall be held by the United States in trust for certain communities of the Mdewakanton Sioux in Minnesota.
